condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At national level
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At sector level
Country has effective measures adopted to mitigate and remedy corruption risks: At sub-national level
Country has strengthened capacities for governance and oversight of rule of law institutions
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Human rights
Country has strengthened institutions and systems supporting fulfilment of nationally and internationally ratified human rights obligations Rule of law and justice
National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services
Number of Electoral Management Bodies (EMBs) with strengthened capacity to conduct inclusive, effective and accountable elections
Women's participation in elections: Country has implemented Temporary Special Measures (TSMs) to ensure women’s participation and representation.
Number of partnerships across the whole-of-society raising awareness to eliminate discriminatory gender and social norms
Women's participation in elections: Number of people on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
Number of population who have access to justice, disaggregated by sex and marginalised groups Male accessing justice
Women's participation in elections: Number of women in voter registry
Women's participation in elections: Number of women on the governing mechanism of the electoral management body
Women's participation in elections: Number of people in voter registry
Number of constitution-making bodies (CMBs) with mechanisms for civic engagement, including the participation of women and marginalized groups
Number of population who have access to justice, disaggregated by sex and marginalised groups Female accessing justice
Number of population who have access to justice, disaggregated by sex and marginalised groups Female eligible for justice
Number of population who have access to justice, disaggregated by sex and marginalised groups Population accessing justice
Number of population who have access to justice, disaggregated by sex and marginalised groups Proportion of male accessing justice
Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in governing mechanism
Women's participation in elections: Proportion of women in voter registry
